text: Fedor Sapon (; ; born 18 March 1993) is a Belarusian footballer. As of 2020, he plays for Granit Mikashevichi. ==References== ==External links== * * *Profile at FC Minsk website Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Minsk players Category:FC Bereza-2010 players Category:FC Torpedo Minsk players Category:FC Smorgon players Category:FC Granit Mikashevichi players
title: Fedor Sapon
